page.title: 17Roller Skating
page.content:
When I go skating, I need a smooth surface and I need to check my wheels in case the nuts are loose. I go skating every day. I skate on the footpaths in Darenth as these are quite smooth. I have fallen over a few times but I have not hurt myself yet. I paid Â£16.99 for my skates. I got them from Marshall-Ward which is a catalogue that sells all sorts of things. I enjoy roller skating because I can have races with my friends and I go to many different places on my skates. I have also entered skating competitions at Swanley Rollerdrome. I haven't won a competition yet but I am gradually becoming a better skater.
{Claire Smith aged 11 {
